segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman doesn't see it; she's just drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she might slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbing the stool could fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl looks so hopeful, reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing is heartbreaking; accidents are coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a sunny garden, innocent outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting wet; damage is done.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sad sight, this unnoticed chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
